subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Paul Byrd did not allow a run for the first five innings and the Indians destroyed Tim Wakefield and Manny Delcarmen in a seven-run fifth for a three-games-to-one lead in the best-of-seven series.
snippet: Paul Byrd did not allow a run for the first five innings and the Indians destroyed Tim Wakefield and Manny Delcarmen in a seven-run fifth for a three-games-to-one lead in the best-of-seven series.
